title: Polish Rice Bread (Pirog)
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '4 tablespoons warm water (45 C)', '225ml (8 fl oz) milk', '100g (3¾ oz) caster sugar', '100g (3¾ oz) butter', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 dessertspoon vanilla extract', 'pinch salt', '550g (1 lb 5 oz) plain flour', '100g (3¾ oz) sultanas', '475ml (17 fl oz) cold milk', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', 'pinch salt', '175g (6 oz) white rice', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '30g (1 oz) butter, melted', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
